description: Try our easy to follow Pan-Seared Scallops With Rustic Tomato Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pan-Seared Scallops With Rustic Tomato Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place tomato, lemon juice, capers, parsley, 1/4 cup oil and 1 tsp salt in a bowl, mixing to combine. Set aside at room temperature for 30 minutes to allow the flavours to develop.
Heat remaining oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat. Pat scallops dry with paper towels, then cook, in 2 batches, for 2 minutes on each side or until golden.
Divide scallops among plates. Spoon over tomato sauce and scatter over extra parsley. Serve with crusty bread.
